name: Taylor Swift
description: Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter known for narrative songs about her personal life.

name: The Weeknd
description: The Weeknd is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer, famous for his unique voice and style.

name: Arijit Singh
description: Arijit Singh is a popular Indian playback singer known for his soulful voice in Bollywood music.

name: Dua Lipa
description: Dua Lipa is a British singer and songwriter famous for her pop hits and distinctive voice.
